required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: TITLE: An Open, Non-comparative, Multi-centre Post Marketing Clinical Follow-up (PMCF) Investigation to Evaluate Performance and Safety on Diabetic Foot Ulcer, DFU, When Using Mepilex Transfer Ag as Intended
clinical_study.official_title: An Open, Non-comparative, Multi-centre Post Marketing Clinical Follow-up (PMCF) Investigation to Evaluate Performance and Safety on Diabetic Foot Ulcer, DFU, When Using Mepilex Transfer Ag as Intended

brief_summary.textblock: An open, non-comparative, multi-centre post marketing clinical follow-up, PMCF, investigation to evaluate performance and safety on diabetic foot ulcer, dfu, when using mepilex transfer Ag as intended.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: changes in signs and symptoms of local infection

secondary_outcome.measure: levels of pain in connetion to dressing changes.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Both gender>=18 years old
2. Subjects with type 1 or 2 diabetes mellitus
3. Two of the signs of infection must be present and recorded (redness, heat, oedema, pain, increased exudates amount, deteriorating wound, fever, odour)
4. Ulcer localization; below the ankle
5. Signed Informed Consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Dry wound
2. Known allergy/hypersensitivity to the dressing
3. Treated with other Silver dressing on the ulcer target within 1 week prior to this investigation
4. Subjects who will have problems following the clinical investigation plan
5. Subjects enrolled in the investigation already
6. Subjects included in other ongoing clinical investigation at present or during the past 30 days. Subjects participating in a clinical sample investigation might be enrolled in the investigation.

overall_official.affiliation: Norfolk & Norwich University Hospitals NHS foundation

facility.name: The Norfolk & Norwich University Hospitals NHS foundation
